Types

CardColour = object
  baseOverride*: Option[string] ## Override for base card
  fontOverride*: Option[string] ## Override for font
  
CardColourData = object
  cards*: seq[string]        ## card names/values
  overrides*: CardColour     ## stores information about overrides for the specific colour

Vars

drawShadowOnTextLayer: bool
Toggles if a shadow should be drawn (for card value). 
globalFontSize: int = 20
Font size used for writing card value into each corner. 
globalSafezone: int = 0
Amount of pixels indented from the corners the text should be rendered. 
imageOutputDirectory: string = "./cards_output/"
Output directory for finished cards 
resources: tuple[baseCard, baseFont: Option[string]]
Base resources, which are parsed from the root directory. If any of these remains None, program will abort. 
resourcesDirectoryPath: string = "./resources/"
Path to the resource directory. 
shadowColours: array[4, uint8]
Shadow colour usef for shadow on card values.

Procs

proc getResourcePath(): string {....raises: [], tags: [].}

Gets the resource path; appends '/' or '' to the end, if none is provided.

This is just to make me write less code.
